messages.content: Is the feature request related to a specific problem?
Yes, a clear and concise description of the problem should be provided.
What should be included in the description of the solution?
A clear and concise description of what the user wants to happen.
What is the purpose of the 'alternatives' section?
To provide a clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features considered.
What can be added in the 'Additional context' section?
Any other relevant context or screenshots about the feature request can be added.
